subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Women)
Basketball (College)
lead_paragraph: The notion of the Baylor star Brittney Griner trying out for the N.B.A., raised recently by the Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban, amounts to a typical tease.
snippet: The notion of the Baylor star Brittney Griner trying out for the N.B.A., raised recently by the Dallas Mavericks owner Mark Cuban, amounts to a typical tease.
